nodes.text: BlasTech Industries Blaster Repair Kit was a repair kit designed to have all the small tools needed to maintain, repair or customize blaster pistols and rifles. The kit contained a pulse adaptor module tester, a collimator beam focuser, a prismatic crystal aligner, static pulse adaptor modules, an energy converter valve, multiple gas valve nozzles, a spare gas container, a spare trigger cable and a variable pressure adjustor. It also had room for three spare power packs.
